summary: Steven is depressed because he's just been dumped by his boyfriend Derek. When Pam brings together a bunch of Steven's friends to cheer him up, things don't go exactly as planned.
cast: Christian Canterbury|Dave McCrea|Deborah Cordell|Nick Katsapetses|Carrie Morgan|Troy Morgan|Steven Sorensen|Alison Jean Trotta|Kara Tsiaperas
title: Get Over It
